# [Interview #923: Ekultúra: Interview with Robert Jordan, Entry #6](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=923#6)

#### Galgóczi Móni

The prophecies often shape the characters' lives in WoT. Do you believe that the stars influence human life and the future?

#### Robert Jordan

No.
